title: Chiefs knock off Texans, Mahomes now 7-0 in divisional round
description: In a tight defensive battle, the Chiefs hold on to advance to the AFC Championship Game.
author: DJ Bien-Aime and Adam Teicher

title: Source: Sarkisian lands new 7-year deal at Texas
description: Just more than a week after its season ended in the College Football Playoff with a semifinal loss to Ohio State, Texas has agreed to a new contract with Longhorns coach Steve Sarkisian, a source told ESPN's Pete Thamel on Saturday, confirming a report.

title: 'Moments like this win titles' - Liverpool are 'level above their rivals'
description: Liverpool flew out of the blocks at the start of 2024-25, emerging as serious Premier League title contenders, but their campaign had shown signs of slowing until Darwin Nunez delivered in a 2-0 win at Brentford.

title: Murphy to face Wilson in Masters final after making 147 break
description: Shaun Murphy compiles only the sixth 147 maximum break in the history of the Masters, in his semi-final against Mark Allen.

title: Commanders vs. Lions live updates: No. 1 Detroit hosts divisional-round game
description: Detroit is looking for a second straight NFC championship game appearance, while Washington is looking for its first trip since the 1991 season.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Australian Open 2025: How to watch the Aryna Sabalenka vs. Mirra Andreeva match today
description: Aryna Sabalenka will play Mirra Andreeva at the Australian Open today. Here's how to tune in.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Release clause removed as Haaland signs HUGE Man City contract
description: Erling Haaland has signed a new nine-and-a-half-year contract to keep him at Manchester City until the summer of 2034.

title: Chiefs beat Texans to keep Super Bowl three-peat dream alive
description: The Kansas City Chiefs kept their hopes of a historic third straight Super Bowl win alive as they held off the Houston Texans in a 23-14 Divisional Round win at Arrowhead on Saturday night.
